system.availability: Used to fuel vehicles, flamethrowers, and explosives. If used for explosives, inflicts 1d10 E, Flame per kilogram, with a blast radius of 4 metres per kilogram. Those caught in the blast must make Agility Test or be set on fire. No Good or Best Craftsmanship
system.cost: GM should consider blast radius/dmg to curve off with excessive mass, oil tankers can carry over 400k tonnes, if that exploded it would be Exterminatus grade by these rules.
